actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A resolution urging the Government of the Federal Republic of Germany to abolish the statute of limitations governing the prosecution of war crimes, or to amend the present statute of limitations to allow a period of time sufficient for the prosecution of those responsible for the horrors of the holocaust.

summary.text: Urges West Germany to abolish or extend the statute of limitations governing the prosecution of war crimes.

titles.title: A resolution urging the Government of the Federal Republic of Germany to abolish the statute of limitations governing the prosecution of war crimes, or to amend the present statute of limitations to allow a period of time sufficient for the prosecution of those responsible for the horrors of the holocaust.
